import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
from wordcloud import WordCloud
source.f37574fb:
Reviews = train_data[['Review_Title', 'Review']]
Others = train_data.drop(['Review_Title', 'Review'], axis=1)
Reviews.head(5)
source.852bd4db:
CloudforTitles = '\n'.join(Reviews['Review_Title'].dropna()).lower()

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(15, 15), facecolor='white')

wc = WordCloud(background_color='white',
               width=1280, height=720).generate(CloudforTitles)
ax.imshow(wc, interpolation='bilinear')


plt.show()
source.4aaeaaf5:
CloudforReviews = '\n'.join(Reviews['Review'].dropna()).lower()
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(15, 15), facecolor='white')

wc = WordCloud(background_color='white',
               width=1280, height=720).generate(CloudforReviews)
ax.imshow(wc, interpolation='bilinear')


plt.show()
